column5: Just got back on No go all morning at
No access from 7am for me. Was still down when I left the house at 1 pm
Yup, Just happen for an hour here.  Again, the only site for me  ART.
yup me too

O.K. here is the word for now. We are having an issue with the version of IP board we are running we are attempting to repair the version but it might not work. At that point we will have to move to a newer version and that will kick out all of our tweeks and faces till we can reinstall them. This will not be cheap or easy and it will take us sometime to work thru it. I will keep you posted as we go so please be patient feel free to keep posting issues here and we will keep working on the site.   Art
Thanks Art.
Thanks for the update Art, nice to know it's not my backwoods internet! LOL
It,s been great all day ART.  Thanks for the update.
down again for me for about 30 minutes this morning
There was severe storms in my area yesterday, my power was out from 10pm until 10:30 am, no idea how much things like that affect the internet.
Maybe I'm lucky but haven't had an issue. I open the site at least once a day.
Thanks for your time and efforts Art! The site has been stable for me since Saturday, good work gentlemen! HH
My wife thought the world was ending , Facebook was down for an hour here
I should know better than to tell the devil my secrets! Took two hours to log in this morning.... HH
had more issues this morning
Spoke too soon. Down this AM but a few minutes later it opened. Got to get my OFC fix in every AM. 2nd only to a cafe coretto, coffee with a shot of Zooma Zooma.
who's on rogers both home and work on rogers and both had same issue I'm on Roger's - no issues yet

The board still remains unstable with the repairs made and we found that we will need to not only upgrade the base program but also switch to a cloud based data center. This will strip off all of our skins and remove all of the improvements we have made. If you have any information that you can not lose copy it we can not retrieve data for you.This will be difficult at best and we will try to do it as quickly as possible. The IT part is being done by Blueye and he will be doing this as a BIG favor to the board and he will need to do it on his time that is available after he does IT for his living. We are grateful that he is doing it because we do not have the funds right now to do the change. Thank you Chad. As we go forward we will try to put up reports as we can. After we have done the change I will put up an announcement and ask for things or issues that are affecting you.  Thanks  Art
Issues with the site ?  One minute I can get here, the next ,cant get here.  Says error is on the site side ?
Yep.. more ups and downs than a new brides pajamas since this morning!
Lol  I had issues in the am but nothing since

yup   ontariofishingcommunity.com Driver ErrorThere appears to be an error with the database. If you are seeing this page, it means there was a problem communicating with our database. Sometimes this error is temporary and will go away when you refresh the page. Sometimes the error will need to be fixed by an administrator before the site will become accessible again. Work ticket came back clean no issues found with the site. We might be having conflicts with providers or browsers. We are still working on it.   Art
